name: New York
description: From hidden speakeasies in the East Village to world-class museums and rooftop bars with skyline views, New York offers endless discovery.

name: Los Angeles
description: Sun-soaked beaches, iconic hikes, legendary food trucks, and a creative energy that fuels everything from street art to fine dining.

name: San Francisco
description: A city of vibrant neighborhoods, world-class cuisine, and jaw-dropping views around every corner of its iconic hills.

name: Denver
description: Craft breweries, mountain adventures, and a booming food scene set against the stunning backdrop of the Rocky Mountains.

name: Santa Fe
description: A treasure trove of galleries, adobe architecture, and Southwestern cuisine nestled in the high desert of New Mexico.

name: Albuquerque
tagline: Hot air balloons and red chile
description: Famous for its balloon fiesta, vibrant Old Town, and a culinary scene built around the legendary New Mexico green and red chile.

name: Honolulu
description: Turquoise waters, volcanic hikes, world-class surfing, and a rich Polynesian culture that makes every visit unforgettable.

name: Bangkok
description: Glittering temples, legendary street food, floating markets, and a nightlife scene that pulses until dawn.

name: London
description: Explore centuries of history alongside cutting-edge galleries, secret gardens, and the best afternoon tea you'll ever have.

name: Sydney
description: Beyond the Opera House and Harbour Bridge, Sydney hides secret gardens, secluded beaches, and contemporary art havens waiting to be discovered.

name: Pittsburgh
description: A city reborn from its industrial past, Pittsburgh surprises with colorful street art, secret art houses, wooden streets, and a treasure trove of relics tucked into its hilltop neighborhoods.

name: Mexico City
description: A sprawling, high-altitude metropolis of surrealist art, secret gardens, futuristic libraries, and hidden colonial villages that defy easy definition.

name: Seattle
description: Beyond the Space Needle and Pike Place, Seattle hides century-old curiosity shops, giant trolls under bridges, surreal architecture, and tranquil Japanese gardens.

name: New Orleans
description: Beyond Bourbon Street, the Big Easy reveals a soulful, eccentric character through pharmacy museums, singing trees, powerful street art, and secret neighborhoods across the river.

name: San Antonio
description: Beyond the Alamo, San Antonio reveals a diverse, artistic, and tranquil character through sunken gardens, immersive art, historic districts, and centuries-old missions.

name: El Paso
tagline: Where the desert meets the border
description: Ancient pictographs, Himalayan temples, sugar-coated houses, and centuries-old missions reveal El Paso's layered, artistic, and deeply historic character.
